channel.title: Co-owner Pickup Command

item.title: Co-owner Pickup Command
item.dc:creator: @Yeckar Yeckar
item.description:
@Yeckar wrote:

I’ll try that. I edited the admin part in my post cuz i didnt want u guys seeing my name… Sorry, i’m like that. I’ll post back if it works. (and i have other admins on my server that i dont want them to pickup… so… i just want it on me and the real owner)

} else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerrights=>3 {
I think and change the ‘admin’ to anybodies name you want it to be for 1 person rights…for future reference

item.title: Co-owner Pickup Command
item.dc:creator: @pur3_pik3r_9 pur3 pik3r 9
item.description:
@pur3_pik3r_9 wrote:

This is what it should look like.

else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2) {

And yes, it works, I just tried it on my server. ) errors

item.title: Co-owner Pickup Command

item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

no, it says if the player name = admin, then it can spawn, no one on your server is called admin. you should make it, and playerrights =>3

item.description:
@pur3_pik3r_9 wrote:

Thats what it should be “admin”, so all your admins (including you, and owner) can beable to spawn.

item.title: Co-owner Pickup Command
item.dc:creator: @Yeckar Yeckar
item.description:
@Yeckar wrote:

Hi, I’m a Co-Owner of a server, and what i needed to figure out is how to allow at least 2 people at once to have the ability to ::pickup.

I have this so far…
} else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”)) {

But i dont know what to add to that. Post answers plz, Thx.

Read full topic
